githapi 0.9.9
  • Reference
  • Release Notes

Reference

Organizations, Teams and Users

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting organizations, teams and users.

update_user()

Update your user properties in GitHub

view_users() view_user() browse_user()

View users in GitHub

update_organization()

Update an organization's properties in GitHub

view_organizations() view_organization() browse_organization()

View organizations in GitHub

view_memberships() view_membership()

View membership of organizations in GitHub

create_team()

Create a team in a GitHub organization

update_team()

Update a team's properties in GitHub

view_teams() view_team() browse_team()

View teams in an organization in GitHub

delete_team()

Delete a team in GitHub

Projects

Functions for creating, updating, viewing and deleting projects.

create_project()

Create a GitHub project

update_project()

Update a GitHub project

view_projects() view_project() browse_project()

View GitHub projects

delete_project()

Delete a GitHub project

create_column()

Create a column in a GitHub project

update_column() move_column()

Update a column in a GitHub project

view_columns() view_column()

View columns within a GitHub project

delete_column()

Delete a column in a GitHub project

create_card()

Create a card in a GitHub project

update_card() move_card()

Update a card in a GitHub project

view_cards() view_card()

View cards within a GitHub project

delete_card()

Delete a card in a GitHub project

Repositories

Functions for accessing information about repositories and their content.

view_files()

View information about a files

create_files()

Create a new files

update_files()

Update existing files

delete_files()

Delete files.

files_exist()

Determine whether files exist in the specified commit.

download_commit()

Download the contents of a commit

view_history()

Get information about the history of commits

view_shas()

Look up the SHA-1 of commit references

shas_exist()

Determine whether commit SHAs exist in the specified repository.

compare_commits()

Compare two commits

compare_files()

Compare the files of two commits

view_releases()

View information about a releases

create_releases()

Create releases at specified commits.

update_releases()

Update releases to new commits.

delete_releases()

Delete releases.

releases_exist()

Determine whether releases exist in the specified repository.

gh_repository()

Get information about a repository

is_repository()

Check whether the input is a valid repository

gh_repositories()

Get information about a user's, organization's or team's repositories.

is_collaborator()

Check if a user is a collaborator

gh_collaborators()

List collaborators

gh_permissions()

Review a user's permission level

gh_commit_comment()

Get a single commit comment

gh_commit_comments()

List comments for a single commit or entire repository

gh_contributers()

List contributors

gh_languages()

List languages

gh_asset()

Get a single release asset

gh_assets()

List assets for a release

Git Data

Functions for accessing git data directly.

view_tags()

View information about a tags

create_tags()

Create tags at specified commits.

update_tags()

Update tags to new commits.

delete_tags()

Delete tags.

tags_exist()

Determine whether tags exist in the specified repository.

view_branches()

View information about branches

create_branches()

Create branches at specified commits.

update_branches()

Update branches to new commits.

delete_branches()

Delete branches.

branches_exist()

Determine whether branches exist in the specified repository.

view_commits()

View information about Git commits.

create_commit()

Create a commit

upload_commit()

Upload a directory of files and create a commit on a branch

commits_exist()

Determine whether commits exist in the specified repository.

view_trees()

View information about Git trees

create_tree()

Create a tree.

upload_tree()

Upload a tree from a directory

trees_exist()

Determine whether a tree exists in the specified repository.

view_blobs()

View information about Git blobs (files)

create_blobs()

Create blobs (files).

upload_blobs()

Upload blobs (files).

blobs_exist()

Determine whether blobs exist in the specified repository.

read_files()

Read the contents of text files

download_files()

Download files and save them to a location

source_files()

Source R files from a GitHub repository

Gists

Functions for accessing information about gists and their contents.

gh_gist()

Get a single gist

gh_gists()

List a user's gists, or all public or starred gists

gh_gist_commits()

List gist commits

is_gist_starred()

Check if a gist is starred

gh_gist_forks()

List gist forks

gh_gist_comment()

Get a single comment

gh_gist_comments()

List comments on a gist

gh_save_gist()

Save files in a gist

gh_source_gist()

Source an R file from a gist

Issues

Functions for accessing information about issues and their contents.

gh_issue()

Get a single issue

gh_issues()

List issues for a repository

gh_user_issues()

List issues assigned to the authenticated user

gh_assignees()

List assignees for issues in a repository

gh_issue_comments()

List comments on an issue

gh_issue_comment()

Get a single issue comment

gh_label()

Get a single label

gh_labels()

List all labels for an issue, milestone or repository

gh_milestone()

Get a single milestone

gh_milestones()

List milestones for a repository

gh_event()

Get a single event

gh_events()

List events for an issue or all issues in a repository

Pull Requests

Functions for accessing information about pull requests and their contents.

gh_pull_request()

Get a single pull request

gh_pull_requests()

List pull requests

gh_pull_commits()

List commits on a pull request

gh_pull_files()

List pull requests files

is_pull_merged()

Get if a pull request has been merged

gh_pull_review()

Get a single review

gh_pull_reviews()

List reviews on a pull request

gh_pull_comment()

Get a single pull request review comment

gh_pull_comments()

List review comments on a pull request or all pull requests in a repository

gh_pull_review_requests()

List pull request review requests

Utilities

Useful functions.

is_sha()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid SHA

is_repo()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid repository name

GitHub API

Functions for accessing the GitHub API.

gh_token()

Get a token for accessing GitHub

gh_url()

Build the URL for the GitHub API

gh_request()

Send an HTTP request to the GitHub API

gh_page()

Get multiple pages from the GitHub API

gh_find()

Find an entity by matching a property value

gh_get()

Send a http GET request to the specified GitHub url

gh_download_binary()

Download a binary file from GitHub

Deprecated

These functions have been deprecated.

gh_git_blob()

Get a blob

gh_git_commit()

Get a commit

gh_git_reference()

Get a reference

gh_git_references()

Get all references

is_tag()

Check whether the input is a valid tag

gh_git_tag()

Get an annotated tag

gh_git_tree()

Get a tree

gh_save()

Download files and save them to a location

gh_source()

Source an R file

gh_tags()

Get information about all the tags in a repository

gh_branch()

Get information about a branch

gh_branches()

Get information about all the head commits in each branch

is_branch()

Checks whether the input is a valid branch

gh_commit()

Get information about a commit

is_valid_sha()

Check whether the input is a valid SHA-1

gh_commit_sha()

Get the SHA-1 of a commit reference

gh_commits()

Get information about all the history of commits

gh_compare_commits()

Compare two commits

gh_compare_files()

Compare the files of two commits

gh_readme()

Get the README

gh_contents()

Get contents of a file

gh_download()

Download the entire tree from a commit

gh_release()

Get a single release

gh_releases()

List releases for a repository

gh_project()

Get a project

gh_projects()

List organization or repository projects

gh_column()

Get a project column

gh_columns()

List project columns

gh_card()

Get a project card

gh_cards()

List project cards

gh_organization()

Get an organization

gh_organizations()

List organizations

gh_membership()

Get organization and team membership

gh_memberships()

List your organization memberships

gh_members()

Get Organization or team members list

gh_user()

Get a single user

gh_users()

Get all users

gh_user_email()

List email addresses for the authenticated user
